channel.title: Timeline (incomplete) on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline (incomplete) on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the aggravated frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. about Xi Jinping (习近平), the President of the People’s Republic of China, and Li Keqiang (李克强), the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.) informing them that I am now resuming my explanations.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the first email which was sent at 15:32 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Now resuming my explanations of the aggravated crimes McDonald’s committed

item.title: Answer sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description:
FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Answer sent by email to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez on October 05, 2021, at 01:20 (am) Beijing time.

item.title: Eric Andrieu, lawyer, Péchenard & Associés
item.description:
Translation coming soon.

Le 27 octobre 2015, je reçois un email de l’avocat de McDonald’s France Éric Andrieu du cabinet Péchenard & Associés.

L’avocat commet une faute exceptionnellement grave en confirmant “à [ses] clients que l’opération [note: en réalité une escroquerie] était conforme aux règles des droits français et européen.” C’est bien évidemment faux. Soit il est incompétent, soit il est complice.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe, sends me an email
item.description: On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe.

item.title: Françoise de Borda, former general counsel of McDonald’s France
item.description:
Translation coming soon.

Françoise de Borda, directrice juridique de McDonald’s France, me réponds pour la première et pour la dernière fois. Elle ment.
